name: OPH_IPROC_INFO
description: This table stores results data for the questions (LQL) configured for use with the Imaging and Procedures visit navigator section.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: IPROC_QUEST_ID
columns.description: Stores the imaging or procedure result form question ID.

columns.name: IPROC_PROMPT
columns.description: Stores the prompt for multiple response imaging or procedure result form questions.

columns.name: IPROC_COMMENT
columns.description: Stores the comment related to an imaging or procedure result finding.

columns.name: IPROC_USER_ID
columns.description: Stores the user who entered the most recent imaging or procedure result information.

columns.name: IPROC_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: IPROC_UPDATED_INST_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant of entry for the most recent imaging or procedure result information.

columns.name: IPROC_LATERALITY_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the laterality for the imaging or procedure result information.
